### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title/Titre
John Paul Lane Bridge Construction

#### Reference Number/Numéro de référence
PW-_PWA-323-6272

#### Announcement Details
* Tendering method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Contracting entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Regions of delivery: Nova Scotia
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Estimated contract value: $1,000,001 to $5,000,000

#### Background
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Eskasoni Band Council has a requirement for Construction Services for the replacement of the John Paul Lane Bridge in Eskasoni, Cape Breton County, NS. The contractor must complete all work within 16 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

#### Documents
The following documents are available for download from the CanadaBuys website:
* Bid solicitation: [ABES.PROD.PW_PWA.B323.E6272.EBSU001.PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/05/be0178bf52b94cb86c16f780acb7f444/ABES.PROD.PW_PWA.B323.E6272.EBSU001.PDF)
* Tender specifications: [john_paul_lane_bridge_replacement.zip](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/06/00ba82bb74a35eb5bb47e3f5d027b2cb/r.116831.001_john_paul_lane_bridge_replacement.zip)
* Architecture drawings: [john_paul_bridge_dwg_200_rev3_2022-10-25_updated.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/31/b38a9d54123ae1866ac3ac1cd7696e23/john_paul_bridge_dwg_200_rev3_2022-10-25_updated.pdf)

#### Important Information
* Due to the COVID-19 situation, all public tender openings are suspended until further notice.
* Proposals must be submitted only to the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Bid Receiving Unit specified in the bid solicitation document.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
